sources.note: Main landing page. Desktop-based EMR, emphasizes ease of use and dictation technology. Developed by IMPS with 30+ years healthcare IT experience.
ONC mandatory disclosures. No additional fees beyond monthly subscription. Lists integrations with SureScripts and NewCrop. FHIR API available. 11 CQMs.

Most detailed feature page. Lists: dictation/voice capture, e-prescribing, referral letters, charting, lab/imaging management, billing integration, medication/allergy tracking, vital signs, drug interaction checking, PQRS reporting, custom data fields.
General EMR marketing page. Sparse on specifics â€” emphasizes workflow improvements, intuitive interface, Meaningful Use Stage II certification.
About page. IMPS has 30+ years experience, formerly known as Voice Activated Systems / Medical Voice Products. Based in Sarasota, FL.
Support page. US-based phone support, no tickets. Monthly subscription pricing. Mentions e-prescribing, voice recognition, electronic labs, HIPAA compliance.
2015 press release. SolidPractice received Stage 2 ONC-ACB certification (Drummond Group, Nov 2014). CEO Dr. Andras Fenyves. Integrates with NewCrop and SureScripts.

SourceForge/Slashdot comparison page. Lists features: appointment management, charting, compliance tracking, e-prescribing, E/M coding, handwriting recognition, integrated telehealth, MIPS certified, patient portal, self-service portal, voice recognition. Zero user reviews. Founded 1994.
LinkedIn company page found in search results but not accessed (requires authentication).
